name: NIST Cybersecurity Framework
description: Framework for Improving Critical Infrastructure Cybersecurity. A risk-based approach to managing cybersecurity risk, composed of three parts: the Framework Core, Implementation Tiers, and Profiles.
issuing_organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)

clauses.title: Physical devices and systems inventory
clauses.description: Physical devices and systems within the organization are inventoried
clauses.implementation_guidance: Maintain comprehensive inventory of all physical devices and systems including hardware assets, network devices, and IoT devices.
clauses.testing_procedures: Verify inventory completeness, test asset discovery processes, and validate inventory accuracy and currency.

clauses.title: Software platforms and applications inventory
clauses.description: Software platforms and applications within the organization are inventoried
clauses.implementation_guidance: Maintain inventory of all software platforms, applications, operating systems, and software licenses.
clauses.testing_procedures: Test software inventory processes, verify license tracking, and validate unauthorized software detection.

clauses.title: Organizational communication and data flows
clauses.description: Organizational communication and data flows are mapped
clauses.implementation_guidance: Document and maintain maps of organizational communication paths and data flows to understand information movement.
clauses.testing_procedures: Review data flow documentation accuracy, verify communication pathway mapping, and test data flow controls.

clauses.title: Asset vulnerabilities identification
clauses.description: Asset vulnerabilities are identified and documented
clauses.implementation_guidance: Implement vulnerability identification processes including scanning, assessments, and threat intelligence integration.
clauses.testing_procedures: Test vulnerability identification processes, verify documentation completeness, and validate risk assessment accuracy.

clauses.title: Identity management and authentication
clauses.description: Identities and credentials are issued, managed, verified, revoked, and audited for authorized devices, users and processes
clauses.implementation_guidance: Implement comprehensive identity and access management including user lifecycle, strong authentication, and regular access reviews.
clauses.testing_procedures: Test identity management processes, verify authentication mechanisms, and validate access review procedures.

clauses.title: Access permissions and authorizations
clauses.description: Access permissions and authorizations are managed, incorporating the principles of least privilege and separation of duties
clauses.implementation_guidance: Implement least privilege and separation of duties principles with regular access reviews and proper authorization workflows.
clauses.testing_procedures: Test access permission management, verify least privilege implementation, and validate separation of duties.

clauses.title: Data-at-rest protection
clauses.implementation_guidance: Implement encryption and access controls to protect data stored in databases, files systems, and backup media.
clauses.testing_procedures: Test encryption implementation, verify access controls for stored data, and validate key management procedures.

clauses.title: Data-in-transit protection
clauses.implementation_guidance: Implement encryption and secure protocols to protect data during transmission across networks and communications channels.
clauses.testing_procedures: Test encryption for data transmission, verify secure protocol usage, and validate certificate management.

clauses.title: Network monitoring
clauses.description: The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events
clauses.implementation_guidance: Deploy network monitoring tools and processes to detect anomalous activity and potential security incidents.
clauses.testing_procedures: Test network monitoring capabilities, verify detection rules effectiveness, and validate alerting mechanisms.

clauses.title: Baseline network and systems activity
clauses.description: A baseline of network operations and expected data flows for users and systems is established and managed
clauses.implementation_guidance: Establish baselines for normal network and system behavior to enable effective anomaly detection.
clauses.testing_procedures: Review baseline establishment processes, verify baseline accuracy, and test anomaly detection capabilities.

clauses.title: Response plan execution
clauses.description: Response plan is executed during or after an incident
clauses.implementation_guidance: Develop and maintain incident response plans with clear procedures, roles, and communication protocols.
clauses.testing_procedures: Test incident response plan execution, verify communication procedures, and validate response team coordination.

clauses.title: Recovery plan execution
clauses.description: Recovery plan is executed during or after a cybersecurity incident
clauses.implementation_guidance: Implement recovery procedures to restore systems and operations following cybersecurity incidents.
clauses.testing_procedures: Test recovery plan execution, verify recovery time objectives, and validate business continuity procedures.
